name: Breach (itch) (anju05)
description:
Your story will unfold by how you play and your decisions.

There is no winning or losing, but death is always permanent. There are 6 different endings that can be achieved!

*Credits to: PV Games for their amazing artwork!*

*Credits to: Quxios for the wonderful plug-ins (which make up  most of the game)*

*Credits to: PSauburnchick12 for those sunshine rays (check her out on deviantart)*
